      • setPixelsPerUnit

        public void setPixelsPerUnit(int pixelsPerUnit)
        Set how many pixels 1 world unit should be. Default is 1:1. If using Box2D, this is considered to be pixels per meter
        Parameters:
        pixelsPerUnit - the number of pixels per world unit
